name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM Document (Legacy)
summary: A CDD file is a diagram created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a program used to create various types of flowcharts and technical drawings. It contains a drawing, such as a flowchart, technical drawing, or conceptual diagram, and may also store ConceptDraw Basic scripting language for manipulating drawing objects and automating repetitive tasks. CS Odessa replaced CDD files with the .CDDZ format when it released version 10 of ConceptDraw PRO (now ConceptDraw DIAGRAM).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
